title: Unable to pip install pytorch-0.4.0
body_html:
I can only install 0.4.1 by the following

pip install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu92/torch-0.4.1-cp27-cp27mu-linux_x86_64.whl

but I want to downgrade to 0.4.0, so I tried

pip install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu92/torch-0.4.0-cp27-cp27mu-linux_x86_64.whl

but it gave me 403 forbidden,

any idea?
body_text:
I can only install 0.4.1 by the following
pip install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu92/torch-0.4.1-cp27-cp27mu-linux_x86_64.whl

but I want to downgrade to 0.4.0, so I tried
pip install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu92/torch-0.4.0-cp27-cp27mu-linux_x86_64.whl

but it gave me 403 forbidden,
any idea?
body:
I can only install 0.4.1 by the following

```
pip install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu92/torch-0.4.1-cp27-cp27mu-linux_x86_64.whl
```

but I want to downgrade to 0.4.0, so I tried

```
pip install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu92/torch-0.4.0-cp27-cp27mu-linux_x86_64.whl
```

but it gave me 403 forbidden,

any idea?
